Setting.Name: GroupName
Setting.Help: The groupname of the banner. Multiple banners in the same group can be displayed together or alternate between eachother

Setting.Name: BannerTypeId
Setting.Help: Defines the type of the banner. 1 = Banner, 2 = MicroButton, 3 = Button, 4 = Block, 5 = Skyscraper, 6 = Text 7 = Script

Setting.Name: BannerCount
Setting.Help: The number of banners to display all at once

Setting.Name: Orientation
Setting.Help: Defines wether to display the banners Horizontally or Vertically
